name: Platshape
description:
Platshape it's a platformer sidescroller game with an automatic generated map and with 3 shapes that are the main core of mechanics of the game, thoses are used for more controll over the jumps and those are a must for the checkpoints!

Developed by CO-DEV.T(Cooperative development team).

Follow us: https://www.facebook.com/Cooperative-Development-Team-107013004320757/

Support us: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=34011698&fan_landing=true
